Publication Title: Adoptive T cell transfer and host antigen-presenting cell recruitment with cryogel scaffolds promotes long-term protection against solid tumors
Publication Authors: Kwasi Adu-Berchie, Joshua M Brockman, Yutong Liu, Tania W To, David K Y Zhang, Alexander J Najibi, Yoav Binenbaum, Alexander Stafford, Nikolaos Dimitrakakis, Miguel C Sobral, Maxence O Dellacherie, David J Mooney
Publication Abstract: Although adoptive T cell therapy provides the T cell pool needed for immediate tumor debulking, the infused T cells generally have a narrow repertoire for antigen recognition and limited ability for long-term protection. Here, we present a hydrogel that locally delivers adoptively transferred T cells to the tumor site while recruiting and activating host antigen-presenting cells with GMCSF or FLT3(Read more on Pubmed)
Publication Assay: Flow Cytometry, Hematoxylin and Eosin Staining Method

Publication Title: Microporogen-Structured Collagen Matrices for Embedded Bioprinting of Tumor Models for Immuno-Oncology
Publication Keywords: Collagen, Cancer, Immunotherapy, Embedded Bioprinting, Microporogens
Publication Authors: Daniel S Reynolds, Irene de Lázaro, Manon L Blache, Yutong Liu, Nicholas C Jeffreys, Ramsey M Doolittle, Estée Grandidier, Jason Olszewski, Mason T Dacus, David J Mooney, Jennifer A Lewis
Publication Abstract: Embedded bioprinting enables the rapid design and fabrication of complex tissues that recapitulate in vivo microenvironments. However, few biological matrices enable good print fidelity, while simultaneously facilitate cell viability, proliferation, and migration.
